rules.prepare:
cd "$BOLT_SOURCE_DIR" autoreconf -vfi || true
cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR" AWK=awk \ "$BOLT_SOURCE_DIR/configure" \ --prefix="$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX" \ --libexecdir="$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib" \ --build="$BOLT_HOST_TYPE" \ --host="$BOLT_HOST_TYPE" \ --disable-rpath \ --disable-nls
touch -d "2000-01-01" \ doc/gawktexi.in doc/gawk.texi doc/gawkinet.texi \ doc/gawk.info doc/gawkinet.info doc/sidebar.awk
rules.install:
cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR" make DESTDIR="$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR" install
rm -f "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/awk" rm -f "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/gawk-"*
